entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning and this afternoon. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
